mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt , B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, A.ctnt, B.unm AS writerNm FROM t_board AS A INNER JOIN t_user AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( title, ctnt, iuser ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND iuser = #{iuser}
